title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, running and chatting with large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with Ollama models (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with additional helpers.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion service powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with strong typing and async enumerables.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter template for building RAG applications using Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant vector stores.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack Bolt app for private or channel-based conversations with Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package published on PyPI for interacting with Ollama servers.

title: ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting and showcasing projects built with Ollama.

title: ollama topic on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread about running Llama 3 locally with Ollama and performance benchmarks.
